main.name: Shoaib Sheikh
main.description: with an Active Top Secret Clearance. I am a highly analytical engineer who takes pride in his craft of writing clean, testable and maintainable code. I love to keep myself up to date by learning new technologies and industry best practices
main.bio: I am a software engineers who loves to get challenged. I love solving difficult problems and help my team overcome obstacles. I love to keep my team's performance at top notch by keep myself up to date with technologies myself as well as mentoring/guiding other team members to join me in my journey. I enjoy working in a full stack development environment, which allows me to use my full spectrum of skills that includes: Java, JS, React, Redux, SpringBoot and cloud technologies like PCF, FireBase and AWS.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in knowing more about the kind of work that excited me the most, please don't hesitate to contact me.

resume.skillmessage: I have a wide variety of skills, here are some of the highlights.

education.description: Some of the highlights of FIU's Undergraduate Coursework includes Operating Systems, Databases, Algorithms, Programming Languages, Data mining, Computer Architecture and Software Engineering.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Working as a Senior Software Engineer, supporting sensitive and open source projects for high profile customers like US Airforce and Veteran Affairs.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Worked as a Software Engineer in an Agile XP environment, leveraging TDD, Pair programming and UCD to support various KesselRun Teams to meet mission-critical goals of US Air force. My tech Stack at KesselRun includes: Java, Javascript, React, Redux, SpringBoot, MariaDB, Pivotal Cloud Foundry, Pivotal Concourse, Docker, Fortify, ThreadFix and Gitlab.

work.title: Systems Engineer II
work.description: Worked as Radar Systems Engineer in support of Raytheon’s PMO. My tech Stack at Raytheon included: C#, VBA, MySQL, Data mining, DOORS, EAGLE, CLEARCASE, SLICWAVE, POWERLOG, WindChill and SAP Prism.

work.title: Systems Engineer
work.description: Worked as an Aviation Software Systems Engineer to support company’s aircraft maintenance system. My tech Stack at Amerijet included: AngularJs, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Ionic, VBA and MySQL.
